brief_summary.textblock:
This project is designed to investigate the association between prenatal exposure to
      environmental contaminants on cognitive development of school-age children

criteria.textblock:
Pregnant mothers carrying full-term infants between 1991 and 1994. No longer recruiting.
        This is not a clinical trial. This is an epidemiological study.

clinical_study.official_title: Prenatal PCB Exposure and Cognitive Development

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Random Sample, Time Perspective: Longitudinal
